To add predictive maintenance to the drone API and farm management app integration, we can implement the following steps:

1. Collect data from the drones about the condition of the farm equipment such as tractors, harvesters, etc.
2. Use machine learning algorithms to analyze the data and detect patterns that may indicate equipment failure.
3. Develop a predictive model that can identify the likelihood of a breakdown based on the data collected.
4. Integrate the predictive model into the farm management app and display the equipment's maintenance status and predictions in the dashboard.
5. Send automated alerts and notifications to the farm manager or technician when the equipment needs maintenance, based on the predictive model's output.

Here is an example code snippet for implementing predictive maintenance in the drone API and farm management app integration:
```python
# Collect data from the drones about the farm equipment
drone_data = get_drone_data()

# Use machine learning algorithms to analyze the data and detect patterns
# that may indicate equipment failure
ml_model = build_ml_model(drone_data)

# Use the model to predict equipment maintenance requirements
maintenance_predictions = ml_model.predict(maintenance_data)

# Integrate the predictive model into the farm management app
app.add_component('predictive_maintenance', ml_model)

# Display the equipment's maintenance status and predictions in the dashboard
dashboard.add_widget('maintenance_status', status_widget)

# Send automated alerts and notifications when maintenance is required
if maintenance_predictions > threshold:
    send_notification(alert_message)
```
Of course, the exact implementation details will depend on the specific technologies and frameworks used in the integration.
